Comments_List: Built in time to work on my senior thesis
The most important thing I learned in this course was skills and resources to successfully develop and write my senior project.
strengths - lots of time to work on thesis, help from prof. feimster, seeing where you are in relation to other students in your major
I think the flexibility was great, but I would have appreciated a little more structure at times (workshopping, specific discussions, etc)
A great course/resource for senior Afam majors
